What is is pissing me off is the fact that you are trying justify your messed up moral compass. You are old enough but have the emotional maturity of a kid to hate someone on superficial characteristics. It is no wonder you wrote a mein kampf summary. Whats worse than a racist is some one who pretends not to be one. You see a life as less worth because he/she is poor. You find the concept of an indian person running for president a wtf moment. I can only imagine what you type behind the veil of anonymity and what other perverted things you do. Whats worse is not the fact that you are racist but its the fact that no one is here is mature enough at 20yo to be the bigger man and stand up for the weak and helpless seemingly oblivious to the elephant in the room.

I am simply stating the reality of the modern world. You know why I said that?
